subject: Sales
title: Who Has the Power?
description: A quick win: understand Who Has the Power?.

hook.text: A freelancer meets a Fortune 500 VP. Who has more power? It depends on who needs the deal more.

buildup.text: Power in negotiation isn't about titles or company size. It's about who can walk away with less pain.

discovery.text: The side with more options, more time, and better information always holds the stronger hand.

twist.text: Power shifts constantly. A desperate seller today might be in demand tomorrow if the market turns.

climax.text: Never assume you're the weaker party. Assess the real balance of needs before you sit down.

punchline.text: Power belongs to whoever needs the deal less.

quiz.question: What truly determines power in a negotiation?
options: Who can walk away with less pain
